messages.content: ComfyUI-LJNodes is a collection of custom nodes designed to enhance the functionality of ComfyUI, providing a more buttery smooth user experience.
What are the main features of ComfyUI-LJNodes?

The main features include UI helpers for common actions, support for adding reroutes in between slots, nodes alignment and spacing utilities, and a variety of custom nodes designed for specific needs.

To install ComfyUI-LJNodes, follow these steps:

1. Open ComfyUI and go to `Manager` > `Install Custom Nodes`.
2. Search for `ComfyUI-LJNodes` in the search bar.
3. Click `Install`.

Alternatively, you can also use Git to clone the repository and restart ComfyUI for the extension to load.
What are the usage shortcuts provided by ComfyUI-LJNodes?

The usage shortcuts include:

1. `Ctrl + G` to add a group for selected nodes.
2. Double clicking the group title to edit.
3. Double clicking the node title to edit or pressing `F2` after selecting a node.
4. `Ctrl + Q` to call `Queue Selected Output Nodes (rgthree)`.
5. Right-clicking on slots to call `Add Reroute in between`.
6. `Alt + W/S/A/D` to align selected nodes.
7. `Alt + H/V` to distribute horizontal/vertical spacing evenly.
What is the GitHub repository for ComfyUI-LJNodes?
The GitHub repository for ComfyUI-LJNodes is located at [https://github.com/coolzilj/ComfyUI-LJNodes.git](https://github.com/coolzilj/ComfyUI-LJNodes.git).
How can I get in touch with the developer of ComfyUI-LJNodes?
You can get in touch with the developer of ComfyUI-LJNodes, SongZi, through Twitter: [@SongZi](https://x.com/Songzi39590361).
What should I do if I find ComfyUI-LJNodes useful or have special needs?
If you find ComfyUI-LJNodes useful or have special needs, the developer is open to your feedback. You can reach out through Twitter to share your thoughts.
